content: these socks came out of a basic necessity to keep my husband well supplied with simple warm work socks after a particularly snowy year my kids also needed some pairs to keep their toes nice and toasty in their boots turns out the socks worked so well that they became the go to sock for all boot wearing occasions these socks are written top down casting on at the cuff and working your way to the toe i find these socks are the easiest to try on as i work using small circular knitting needles and my toes don t cause the stitches to fall off the needles as easily the heel is a traditional heel flap and gusset using the eye of partridge style of construction to provide an extra thick well cushioned heel the socks are made using worsted weight yarn providing an extra thick and durable sock i recommend using a worsted weight sock yarn made out of wool and nylon for the toughest of socks but any worsted weight wool will make lovely warm thick socks sizing child adult s/m adult l/xl finished measurements unstretched cuff 6 5 7 25 8 75 circumference leg adjustable foot adjustable material approx 175 meters 225 meters 255 meters worsted weight yarn suggested yarn to use 100% wool or a 80% wool/20% nylon blend for the longest wearing socks gauge 22 st and 30 rounds/4 in stockinette stitch with larger needles suggested needles us #3 3 25mm and us #5 3 75mm dpn small circular needles or long circular needles for magic loop method notions stitch markers and darning needle
